Module RMA
Package RMA

Class RMAListViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMA.RMAListViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class RMAListViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    RMAListViewController contains the logic and field references to the GUI controls on the RMAListView form.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.control.Button btnDelete
      btnDelete deletes the selected RMAs in the tblRMASummary list.
      private javafx.scene.control.Button btnNewRMA
      btnNewRMA brings up a new RMAForm for creating a new RMA.
      private javafx.scene.control.Button btnRefresh
      btnRefresh is used to fetch the latest RMA list from the SQL Server RMA database.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​CustomerAddress> colBusinessName
      colBusinessName contains the business name associated with the RMA request.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​CustomerAddress> colCustomerInfoShipAddress
      colCustomerInfoShipAddress displays information about the customer and their shipping address.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​java.lang.String> colCustomerName
      colCustomerName contains the customer name associated with the RMA request.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​PurchaseOrderProduct> colProduct
      colProduct contains the name of the product being returned.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​java.lang.Boolean> colReplaceRepairIndicator
      colReplaceRepairIndicator is used to show whether the customer's replacement or repair has been sent.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​java.lang.Integer> colReturnQuantity
      colReturnQuantity displays the quantity of product that the customer is returning.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​java.lang.String> colRMAId
      colRMAId contains the RMA's ID.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​java.lang.String> colRMAStatus
      colRMAStatus contains the RMA's status.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<RMAListViewModel,​java.lang.Boolean> colShouldDelete
      colShouldDelete is used to mark whether this RMA should be deleted from the database.
      private javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<RMAListViewModel> filteredList
      filteredList is used to filter tblList when the user searches for an RMA ID in txtSearch.
      private java.time.LocalDateTime lastUpdated
      lastUpdated keeps track of the last time the RMA list was updated.
      private javafx.scene.control.Label lblItemCount
      lblItemCount contains the number of items in the RMA list and the last time the list was updated.
      private javafx.beans.property.StringProperty tableCount
      tableCount manages the text above the TableView listing the number of items and the last update date and time (Requirement 2.1)
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<RMAListViewModel> tblList
      tblList is the ObservableList representing the contents of tblRMASummary.
      private javafx.scene.control.TableView<RMAListViewModel> tblRMASummary
      tblRMASummary contains the list of open RMA requests available to this user's role.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField txtSearch
      txtSearch is a TextField used to filter the RMA list by an RMA ID.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RMAListViewController()
      Default empty constructor, used when FXMLLoader loads the fxml file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void btnDeleteOnAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      btnDeleteOnAction goes through the list of selected RMAs for deletion and calls their delete method.
      protected void btnNewRMAOnAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      btnNewRMAOnAction opens a new RMA form.
      protected void btnRefreshOnAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      btnRefreshOnAction handles refreshing the list of open RMAs available to this user's role.
      private void getRMAList()
      getRMAList populates and refreshes the ObservableList backing the TableView.
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      initialize ties together the GUI's elements with the RMAListViewModel model and creates any necessary ChangeListeners on the controls.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Parameters:
